FuncDef: This command configures the length of the optional cookie field. Thedefaultparameter only applies in theconfig>router>l2tp>group>l2tpv3context.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the cookie length in bytes. Values-4, 8.
In the config>router>l2tp>group>l2tpv3, this parameter references the cookie length configured in the config>router>l2tp>l2tpv3 context.
